item.title: Changing Committer, Author, and Email in Git
item.description: I recently observered in my GitHub profile that most of my commits are not shown in my contribution activity. After doing a quick search, I found that the problem because my email in my commits do not match the email associated with my GitHub account. Changing Commits in the Remote Repository You need to use the filter-branch command to change the emails and names. git filter-branch -f --env-filter ' GIT_AUTHOR_NAME="yourname"; GIT_AUTHOR_EMAIL="youremaill@host.
